summary: Prevent unlogged decisions by instrumenting oversight guard

steps.title: Identify oversight scenarios
steps.notes: Document cases where instructions or ideas slip without receipts (e.g., new ideas not backlogged, commands run without plan).

steps.title: Design guardrail mechanism
steps.notes: Implement automation or workflow hooks that alert when actions lack plans/receipts (planner CLI lint, CI check, or teof doctor).

steps.title: Implement guard and tests
steps.notes: Build the guard, add unit tests, and integrate into CI or tooling.

steps.title: Document process update
steps.notes: Update docs/workflow with the new safeguard so humans/agents know the expectation.

checkpoint.description: Guardrail detects and blocks unlogged actions; evidence shows compliance
